scMisc 0.4.0

nice Seurat dot plot

Source: R/visualization.R
dotPlot.Rd

create and save a nice Seurat dot plot

Usage

dotPlot(
  path,
  object,
  par,
  dot_min,
  scale = TRUE,
  ortho = "none",
  width = 10,
  height = 10
)

Arguments

path

path to markers.csv

object

Seurat object

par

column name in markers.csv

dot_min

minimal dot size

scale

should the values be scaled? (default: TRUE)

ortho

convert to orthologues? Allowed values: none, mouse2human or human2mouse

width

width of output plot (default: 10)

height

height of output plot (default: 10)

Value

save dot plot to folder results/dotplot/

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
dotPlot(object = sc_merge, par = "cellmarkers_covid", dot_min = 0.1)
} # }
